claim.text: Toronto Tool Library, established in 2013, runs a membership-based model across multiple locations
claim.claim: Toronto Tool Library was established in 2013 and runs a membership-based model across multiple locations

results.summary: The Toronto Tool Library was established in 2013 with a membership-based model, but the 'multiple locations' claim needs verification as location count has varied over time.
results.detail: The Toronto Tool Library was indeed founded in 2013, starting in the Parkdale neighborhood of Toronto. It operates on a membership-based lending model where members pay annual fees to borrow tools. The organization has operated multiple locations at various points, though the exact number of current locations may have changed over time. Without current web access, I cannot verify the present number of active locations.
sources: Unable to access web sources - based on training knowledge up to 2024
